description:
A basic front attack with a push at the end.
(DO NOT move this out of place)
name: Attack
note:
<absSettings>
collider: box, 36, 24
infront: true
rotate: true
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
user casting true
wait 15
user casting false
trigger
wait 15
user unlock
</absSequence>
<absOnDamage>
target cancel
target jump away 40
</absOnDamage>

description: Dodge Attacks (DO NOT move this out of place)
name: Dodge
note:
<absSettings>
infront: false
rotate: false
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
wait 10
trigger
user move forward 100 false
wait 60
user unlock
</absSequence>

description: Heal (DO NOT move this out of place)
name: Heal
note:
<absSettings>
itemConsumable: 1
collider: box, 36, 24
cooldown: 180
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
trigger
wait 75
user unlock
</absSequence>

description: A local attack for traps only
name: Local Attack

description: Shoots an arrow that pierces through enemies.
name: Ranged Attack
note:
<absSettings>
collider: box, 12, 36
through: 3
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
wait 15
user forceSkill 6
wait 15
</absSequence>

description: Shoots an arrow that pierces through enemies.
name: Arrow
note:
<absSettings>
collider: box, 12, 36
through: 3
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
picture arrow true 4
move forward 480 20
</absSequence>

name: Aim
note:
<absSettings>
collider: box, 80, 800
infront: true
rotate: true
</absSettings>

user lock
wait 15
adjustAim
</absSequence>

trigger

name: Fire Dot
note:
<absSettings>
collider: circle, 96, 96
cooldown: 180
infront: true
</absSettings>

user casting true
collider show
wait 15

user casting false
trigger
wait 60
trigger
wait 60
trigger
</absSequence>

description:
Shoots an arrow with a trail. Stops when it hits
an event or tile
name: Boss Ranged Attack
note:
<absSettings>
collider: box, 32, 32
through: 3
</absSettings>
<absSequence>
user lock
wait 30
picture fireball%[4-4] true 2 spread
spread forward 16 480 30 EVEN 100
</absSequence>
